meanings.definition: A type of ceramic vase or jar used for holding flowers or other decorative items.
meanings.sent1: The potiches on the shelf was filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the delicate roses in the potiches.
meanings.sent3: The potiches looked like a beautiful centerpiece at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of potiches added an elegant touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the potiches made them stand out.

meanings.definition: The act of placing or arranging items in a potiche.
meanings.sent1: His skillful potiches of the flowers created a stunning display.
meanings.sent2: The potiches of the fruits on the table looked appealing.
meanings.sent3: She performed a graceful potiches of the decorative stones.
meanings.sent4: The potiches of the candles illuminated the room beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The careful potiches of the items showed attention to detail.
